name: Fight For Me! 0.2
description:
Summon Minions and defeat the incoming Enemies. You win by defeating the Boss that appears around 8 minutes.

Movement: WASD or virtual joystick on the left 

Skills: Virtual joystick on the right

! If the game is too laggy, please download and run it locally. !

Tiles:  

0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii

cainos.itch.io/pixel-art-top-down-basic

Sounds: 

maou.audio

kronbits.itch.io/freesfx
